description: This foundation-level studio course introduces the aesthetic, conceptual, and technical foundations
of new media art-making and ways new media inform the creation and understanding of art in
cultural contexts, with special emphasis on cyberculture and hypertext.    Students explore the form
and space of new media images through a wide variety of materials and media.  The course
emphasizes strategies for idea generation. Students engage in dynamic activity, spirited
investigation, and thoughtful creative expression.  Materials fee.  Offered each semester. Counts
